author: fdmanana
msg: Skip multipart attachments if doc is rejected by the target
If the target rejects the document (via validate_doc_update functions),
the connection is hold for a long time because the attachments are not

author: fdmanana
msg: Fixes to the doc PUT multipart API
Don't hold the connection forever if the document is rejected
by a validate_doc_update function. The solution is to discard
all the attachments' data if the document was rejected.
